full_output.summary: Aspiring full-stack web devloper with a strong foundation in front-end and back-end technologies. Excited to contribute to a dynamic team and further develop my skills in a real-world environment.

projects.name: CBIR - Content Based Image Retrieval
projects.description: Developed a Content-Based Image Retrieval (CBIR) software using Python Flask and image processing techniques. Implemented a database-driven system to compare image features and cluster similar images using the K-means algorithm.

projects.name: University Management
projects.description: Designed and developed a comprehensive University Management system using ADO.NET, C#, and SQL. This system efficiently manages student records, faculty information, student marks, and grades.

experiences.description: Interned as a Full Stack Developer, collaborating in a team to explore and implement technologies including ASP .NET Entity Framework, React.js, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
Conducted Image Processing using Python, applying K-means clustering to White Blood Cell (WBC) images for shape, size and texture analysis.
